name: Historic England Scheduled Monuments â€” Medieval Manchester (GIS)
description: Downloadable GIS shapefiles from Historic England's Open Data Hub for scheduled monuments in Manchester, including the Hanging Bridge/town defences (#1020983) and other medieval sites. Pre-formatted vector data ready for import.
notes:
GIS data sources:
- Historic England Open Data Hub: https://opendata-historicengland.hub.arcgis.com/datasets/scheduled-monuments
- Shapefile downloads: https://historicengland.org.uk/listing/the-list/data-downloads/
- Greater Manchester HER (GMAAS): https://gmaas.salford.ac.uk/historic-environment-record/ (19,000+ records, available as ESRI shapefiles on request)

Key scheduled monuments:
- Hanging Bridge & town defences: #1020983 (SJ83859869)
- Polygon boundaries for protected medieval areas

This could start at Stage 2 (Acquired) if shapefiles are downloaded directly.
